title: Once Upon a One Shot - With Caldwell Tanner & Connie Chang
itunes:title: Once Upon a One Shot - With Caldwell Tanner & Connie Chang
description:
Ever heard of a Bunyip... No? What about the friendly Tsuchinoko... Really? OK OK what about Impundulu? Then why not sit down for this tale!

Jammal, everyone's favorite maniacal boss, has been magically transported into The Book As It Is Written, a compendium of all the creatures you can recollect. Join our Halflings and two very special guests on an epic, silly, heart-warming and somewhat absurd adventure in a quest to find Jammal and gain NOTORIETY!


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
